original_text: And he was seeking to see who Jesus was, but on account of the crowd he could not, because he was small in stature.
korean_text: 그가 예수께서 어떠한 사람인가 하여 보고자 하되 키가 작고 사람이 많아 할 수 없어

sentences.original_text: And he was seeking to see who Jesus was
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 예수가 누구인지 보려고 힘썼습니다

sentences.original_text: but on account of the crowd he could not
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 무리 때문에 그는 볼 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: because he was small in stature.
